content:
As we discussed today in the Connectathon, if you want to propose existing or new issues for inclusion into the next version (1.1) of CDS Hooks, please label the issue with the next-version label or simply comment that you want to nominate this for inclusion and we'll label it for you.

A list of labeled next-version issues can be viewed at https://github.com/cds-hooks/docs/labels/next-version
